page.title: 12***Grange Farm**************
page.content:
My grandfathers farm is called the Grange. It is on the Burrough Road. The house is 90years old. It is very big and has a very big garden. There are six bedrooms upstairs, and four rooms downstairs, and it has two toilets .The farmer grows potatoes to sell at the farm. He also advertises in the Melton Times and he delivers in the district. He grows wheat and hay too. The farm has four sheds. He milks the cows by hand .He milks six cows and the milk goes to the farmhouse and there's a bit for the cats.
Written by Lucy Wright aged 10yrs.
